original_title: Continuar a Viver ou Os Índios da Meia-Praia
overview: The film documents the start, and difficult progress of a house cooperative in the fishermen's village of Meia Praia, during the revolutionary process in Portugal, from April 25, 1974 until mid-1976. - IMDb
title: Continuar a Viver ou Os Índios da Meia-Praia
